purpose: Facilitate the development and orchestration of AGI systems using a flexible agent-based framework
principle: Utilizes a modular architecture to allow for the integration and coordination of multiple AI agents
reusability: Highly composable with modular components, offers APIs for custom agent integration and orchestration
limitations: Alpha status indicates potential instability and limited documentation; may require significant setup and customization
name: AgentForge
highlight: Extensible framework for building advanced AGI systems with multi-agent coordination
